title: Bob Lee, Cash App Founder, Is Fatally Stabbed in San Francisco
description: Mr. Lee, 43, the chief product officer at the cryptocurrency start-up MobileCoin, was the victim in a fatal stabbing on a city street early Tuesday, his family said on social media.

title: How to Brainstorm and Plan Events With Friends and Family
description: Many apps and tools for online collaboration work just as well for personal projects as they do for office tasks, and can be fun.

title: How to Brainstorm and Plan Events With Friends and Family
description: Many apps and tools for online collaboration work just as well for personal projects as they do for office tasks, and can be fun.

title: For Lower-Income Students, Big Tech Internships Can Be Hard to Get
description: Critics say the intern selection process often favors wealthier students, just like the admission process at some elite colleges.

title: This Historically Black University Created Its Own Tech Intern Pipeline
description: A new program at Bowie State connects computing students directly with companies, bypassing an often harsh Silicon Valley vetting process.
